website_summaries.verdict: Provides heavy-duty, long-lasting rust protection on all things metal.
pros: Gives heavy-duty rust protection, even in humid environments or in salt water
Dries to a hard wax-like texture
Can also be used on electrical connections
cons: Has a yellow tint even after dried and doesn't come with a spray straw

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!!
customer_reviews.text: If you have metal parts that are exposed to salt water, this product is a must have. It works very well to protect against salt water corrosion, rust, and damage. It does leave somewhat of a very light gold-ish color to whatever it is sprayed on. It is fairly thick, but does not come off when exposed to saltwater. It is great quality. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: j_m1964

customer_reviews.title: Cosmoline is a proven rust inhibitor
customer_reviews.text: I bought four cans and sprayed it into every place I could think of in my 78 Scout. I sprayed it down the rocker panel from both ends. When I crawled underneathe to spray the floor pan I could see the cosmoline leaching out the seams of the rocker panel below. It should stop crevice corrosion if it can penetrate into gaps like that. the cans have no straw type nozzle so I removed one from another product and that worked well to get inside panels and drilled holes.
customer_reviews.author: PhilMar

customer_reviews.title: Good formulation to prevent rust
customer_reviews.text: I used this to spray inside the removable plugs in the wheel wells of m GMC Sierra. I flush the wheel wells of dirt and salt twice a year and then spray this product inside the holes to prevent any corrosion from beginning. So far, so good!
customer_reviews.author: Haggis

customer_reviews.title: like the old school Cosmoline
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I was looking for. Compared to some other products I purchased which went on heavy and wet (and still haven't dried), this product sprayed evenly, lightly, and dried to a hard waxy compound, like the old school Cosmoline. I believe this spray will properly fight off corrosion and salt spray. I used it to spray down my Chrysler Town & Country minivan, to give the Chrysler steel a fighting chance against the Illinois and Wisconsin road crews. I will definitely buy more.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Veto

customer_reviews.title: This is a wonderful product to protect against rust
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful product to protect against rust. I had used and sold the other brand, but this turned out to be a virtual match of the same quality. If you knock off the old rust with a wire wheel or brush, you only need to spray on this CRC Inhibitor to end up with a professional quality protective coating. My boat trailer looks like it had a makeover. I also used it on my hitch receiver, and it too, looks almost new again. So, if it's rustable or corrodible, covert it with CRC 06026 and stop worrying about the problem. Fare price for what it does, and it's less costly than the other brand.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffery L. Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Great corrosion protection
customer_reviews.text: Look no further if you need corrosion protection for marine applications. Bought this for my boat. Leaves a protective coating over exposed metal parts on my two outboards and other metal parts. Have tried other products but this seems to be the best corrosion protection out there.
customer_reviews.author: Bill M

customer_reviews.title: Sticky
customer_reviews.text: Leaves quite the sticky residue. Bearing grease is also a great corrosion inhibitor. So is honey. I sprayed this on my nice tap and die set. Doesn't rust, but the residue sticks to everything and has a brownish tinge to it. If i did it again I'd probably opt for a spray wax or plane ol WD40
customer_reviews.author: Trevor

customer_reviews.title: Seems to work as expected - Cosmoline-based
customer_reviews.text: I decided to use this based on some reviews I saw on Project Farm on YouTube. His test showed it was best at corrosion protection. I have purchased a few cans to use under my car on the frame, etc. Seems to hold up well and the price is reasonable. Cosmoline has been around since WWII and is widely used today for all types of applications - has stood the test of time...
customer_reviews.author: Greg Z

customer_reviews.title: Extremely Useful spray
customer_reviews.text: CRC makes a great line of products and this is no exception. I use this for marine electronic terms, battery terms. I also pack a lightly soaked cotton pad with my other electronics in a dry bag when kayaking. Great for tool protection
customer_reviews.author: Bcapollo

customer_reviews.title: Who does not know, wisdom
customer_reviews.text: If you do anything on a do it yourself basis, or if you work for someone, this is the can you need to have around you. There are so many uses that it would take me hours to explain. Even if your toys are in a garage, or if they stay outdoors most of the time, get some and protect your toys. Every weekend warrior should be using this stuff. P.S. My friend was so impressed, that this little can landed me a free trip on a local pontoon, after they saw how it helps even on the rails and hinges located on boat. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: jEEPSTER

customer_reviews.title: Works great but leaves a thick yellow goo on what you spray it on
customer_reviews.text: This is the best product out there according to my research and all the YouTube videos where they test different types of sprays for anti-corrosion. However it will leave a yellow gook on anything you spray it on. I can see why it works it adds a thick layer of yellow ish oil or product on what you spray it on.
customer_reviews.author: Truth and nothing but ...

customer_reviews.title: Perfect performance
customer_reviews.text: I've used CRC corrosion inhibitor for years and it's never let me down. I purchased a high carbon steel sword about 20 years ago. After several months it started to develop undesirable rust spots. I applied CRC corrosion inhibitor at the time and it hasn't rusted since. Almost 20 years and still going strong. If you're concerned about aesthetics it leaves an amber waxy firm.
customer_reviews.author: Keens

customer_reviews.title: Good Rust Inhibitor
customer_reviews.text: In terms of preventing rust on non-stainless steels, this is about as good as it gets. It works by laying down a thick waxy coating. I use it on a saw table between uses. It definitely prevents rust but has to be cleaned off with a solvent like acetone to prevent transferring the coating to other surfaces. Has some odor.
customer_reviews.author: RH

customer_reviews.title: It works against corrosion on new metal.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for years . As the owner of several boats over the years and boating in salt water this product is a must on trailer leaf springs bolts etc. that are submerged in saltwater. It's not pretty but it prevents corrosion. Suggestion: spray it on heavy and reapply from time to time.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Welch

customer_reviews.title: one of the best products for the money
customer_reviews.text: just watch on youtube " project farm" channel...one of the best products to keep rust at bay
customer_reviews.author: toker

customer_reviews.title: It's like LPS-3 or Cosmoline
customer_reviews.text: Excellent rust proofing spray. It leaves and amber waxy coating. Best defense against salty roads for your car. Spray where rust starts. I used it on the rocker panels, any bolt exposed to the salt, anywhere water drains out, hinges etc.
customer_reviews.author: DoggyDoctor

customer_reviews.title: Seems like a good product
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a good product. Something wrong with the nozzle, seems like it kept getting clogged. Happened on 2 cans i used. Blew out the nizzles with a compressor and it fixed the issues. Kept having to do that, a bit frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher T Khalaf

customer_reviews.title: No Spray straw, couldn't use
customer_reviews.text: I didn't have a chance to use this product because the spray can came without the straw which I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Hevans

customer_reviews.title: Used on my motorcycle handlebar switches
customer_reviews.text: Don't use too much as it is not conductive and the switch will not make contact. Will help prevent corrosion on the contacts. Spray some in, work the switch to be sure it still operates.
customer_reviews.author: valkyrie

customer_reviews.title: A thinner version of wax type coatings.
customer_reviews.text: The coating does not seem to be as thick as LPS 3 Only time will tell as to how effective it is.
customer_reviews.author: hifidoc

customer_reviews.title: Works like you want it to
customer_reviews.text: We live in the saltwater envirment where even the best stainless can rust. I use this stuff on everything and it works. Better the 40 for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Marco Rusty

customer_reviews.title: Rust proofed truck with it.
customer_reviews.text: Used this to rust proof my F150 Supercrew. Sprayed it in the rockers, doors, tailgate, and rear wheel arches. Took about 4 cans to get decent coverage. You'll have to use the nozzle of another product if you want to spray it through a straw. Sprays kinda watery so it seeps between pinch welds and seams pretty well, but also sticks to where you spray it. Dries to a slightly sticky amber color. Stinks horribly when you are applying it and will give you a headache so do it in a well ventilated area. I plan on reapplying it every fall. Only time will tell how well it actually stops rust.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Hard to tell too early
customer_reviews.text: It didn't eat away at the existing rust but time will tell how it protects the steel over the long haul. Mine came with the spray nozzle broken but it was a new bottle so ill attribute the problem to poor quality spay nozzle
customer_reviews.author: AF

customer_reviews.title: Way less expensive than buying it retail
customer_reviews.text: Does what is supposed to do. Spray this stuff all over the jets on my boat after every other time I take it out in ocean.
customer_reviews.author: Dominic

customer_reviews.title: OUTSTANDING
customer_reviews.text: use this on the boat trailer which launches in salt water, has stopped the hardware corrosion issues. Very pleased with this and at a good price.
customer_reviews.author: hurt

customer_reviews.title: Top quality product.
customer_reviews.text: If you want to prevent rust on your car this is the stuff you want. Save the frame of your car from the ravages of winter salt use.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly M.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice is hard to find in retail stores.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good product, i used to protect my car undercarriage. To protect from salt roads. It aplys good no mess. Is like a waxy stuff but it drys fast. I would recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: maninblack

customer_reviews.title: A must have to protect anything
customer_reviews.text: I've used this for years and its the best I've found for protecting anything that gets exposed to water. I use it on boats and pwc to protect parts from corrosion, rust, etc. Definitely worth having for protecting expensive items.
customer_reviews.author: sean a sikes

customer_reviews.title: Rust Killer
customer_reviews.text: This outstanding product sprays easily, soaks into seams, and then hardens to a wax-like coating that does not wash off.
customer_reviews.author: William Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Good product!
customer_reviews.text: Really seems to stick to the under carriage of my car. I think it will really help with rust. I will say that I feel you should use it in a well ventilated area. I used it in my garage and could see the fumes in the air. The smell was pretty strong for awhile...although not totally unpleasant.
customer_reviews.author: Ranchcop

customer_reviews.title: Great for marine use
customer_reviews.text: Works great on boat lift cables, slides, not as thick of a coating like the older stuff but still works!
customer_reviews.author: Alan S

customer_reviews.title: Smelly but effective just use in well ventilated area
customer_reviews.text: Kept my tools rust free for three month plus it prevented rust from progressing on my old tools.
customer_reviews.author: Peter D Giatrakis

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: Have just recently used it with good a result. Applies easily. Appears to adhere well. When it gets dirty just a water hose cleans it up nicely. Have not had to respray because it has only been on for a few weeks . Time will tell if it stands up to our east central Florida weather.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne B.

customer_reviews.title: No Longer Includes Red Tube Nozzle
customer_reviews.text: I'm happy with the product, I've bought it a few times. Just gripes me that they no longer ship the red tube with it any longer.
customer_reviews.author: Midwest Mike

customer_reviews.title: Protected my trailer springs from rust
customer_reviews.text: Bought a new aluminum trailer for my 17 ft skiff. The first thing to go in salt water is the leaf springs and shackles. I sprayed this corrosion inhibitor all over them with two coats and so far, I haven't see the first spot of rust on them. This is an unusual application, but it appears to work great so far!
customer_reviews.author: Harbourbug

customer_reviews.title: Dries to the touch
customer_reviews.text: I really like how this product dries. There’s no sticky or greasy residue. Also fairly low odor. Check out the YouTube channel Project Farm for a good demonstration.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Leonard

customer_reviews.title: Very good stuff
customer_reviews.text: I really like this stuff. I have quite a few old iron things that don't get used much in my barn. When I put them away, I spray them down with this stuff and they do not rust. I love the smell of it too.
customer_reviews.author: Ohio Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: Does exactly what it claims to do. Quality American product.
customer_reviews.author: Pileits

customer_reviews.title: In areas not exposed to wear renewing the film about every 6 months seems keep corrosion pretty much at bay
customer_reviews.text: I live & work in a Ocean side community, this product works as advertised, leaves a waxy film that seems to hold up well for areas not exposed to wear/traffic and will it last a few weeks on areas that are exposed to light traffic/wear. In areas not exposed to wear renewing the film about every 6 months seems keep corrosion pretty much at bay.
customer_reviews.author: C-Rec7777

customer_reviews.title: No rust
customer_reviews.text: Covers well and seems like it will do the job. Covered 12 machine cast iron surfaces with I’m guessing half a can left. No rust in a couple months.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Speed

customer_reviews.title: Easy To Apply
customer_reviews.text: Use it on automotive underbodies, in areas that don't experience direct impingement of water or other substances from wheel rotation, that have light rust that I don't feel like prepping for paint. Handy to use and dries to a slightly tacky non-messy film.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The product is great, but the aerosol makes a mess all over ...
customer_reviews.text: The product is great, but the aerosol makes a mess all over the can and your hands when spraying. I recommend buying a gallon and a decent manual spray bottle and doing it the old fashioned way.
customer_reviews.author: JMReviewer

customer_reviews.title: great company
customer_reviews.text: a very good product as I would expect from CRC. very penetrating.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: GREAT product to product from high humidity environment like south ...
customer_reviews.text: GREAT product to product from high humidity environment like south Louisisna or Florida. I spray my tools that are not used frequently and it provents that rusty pitting. Also spray my guns before using for duck hunting.
customer_reviews.author: Harold T. Billiodeaux

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: The product is really good, but the only problem that I had was when I was between 3/4 to 1/2 of the way used, the spray got clogged on me. Besides that, it got the job done!
customer_reviews.author: Anna Zheng

customer_reviews.title: The stuff works
customer_reviews.text: Just what everyone told me about was true .You need to have this Incase you live by the water
customer_reviews.author: TDE

customer_reviews.title: not functional
customer_reviews.text: one of the spray cans dosent spry good you need to shake and turn it its impossible to connect a straw
customer_reviews.author: Yosi Y.

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Foes the job well. Costs what your trying to protect with a light tan colored film. Actually works.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Giombetti

customer_reviews.title: Decent product I think it will postpone the cancer that ...
customer_reviews.text: Decent product I think it will postpone the cancer that plagues all things made of medal in the Midwest but we will see has the same look as the old ziebart anticorrosive that many have spent a ton for and I was able to spray under vehicle and use all contents of the can I am holding out on the five stars just because I applied it this year I want to see if it holds up and does what it's intended too
customer_reviews.author: Robert Freels

customer_reviews.title: Love it. Works good
customer_reviews.text: Have used this stuff for YEARS. Love it. Works good. Coated a lot of my outside antenna connections. Like military cosmoline without the cloth. Great for preventing corrosion.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Not clear lubricant.
customer_reviews.text: Used for lubricating outboard engine block. Lubricant is yellow, not clear. Left yellow residue on nice grey engine block.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: A much better alternative to the WD product
customer_reviews.text: A much better alternative to the WD product. Clings nice and resists wash off. I use this for fishing gear and a saltwater use boat and trailer.
customer_reviews.author: Dale L. Clark

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for preventing rust.
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is pretty neat, It does a great job at preventing corrosion. I spray it on all my truck parts that I don't want to rust. It leaves a sticky residue, but that's ok. I just wish it wasn't so expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Grand House

customer_reviews.title: Not good for lubricating
customer_reviews.text: Not good for lubricating, dries into a waxy brownish coating on anything you spray it on. Excellent corrosion prevention, good on bolt heads, and all untreated metal surfaces. Do not use as a lubricant. Coating comes off with common de-greasers.
customer_reviews.author: C. Farmer

customer_reviews.title: A must have for jet ski's. Spray down all ...
customer_reviews.text: A must have for jet ski's. Spray down all metal parts after each ride and no corrosion so far.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Smells good using it
customer_reviews.text: Make sure to wear gloves. Smells good using it. Smells bad after 6 hours not being able to get rid of it. Small learning curve when using it for RC stuff but now I can fly my drone in the rain :) Tried a motor/esc underwater and it works!
customer_reviews.author: neuroflat

customer_reviews.title: seems to do its job
customer_reviews.text: Seems to do its job. It's basically spray on wax preservative,

customer_reviews.title: Does what it says!
customer_reviews.text: Works really well but does leave a yellowish film behind. If you use this in an area out of view, or don't care about that, it works great to protect your metal. My boat trailer loves the staff!
customer_reviews.author: ChadSD

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good for protecting electrical connections in my boat and car against weather and time.
customer_reviews.author: Randy

customer_reviews.title: Thick Corrosion Fighting Coating
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. I sprayed the cad plated hardware that came with a hitch kit with it about 6 months ago. The coating has proven durable and I see no evidence of the coating separating. The hardware still looks brand new.
customer_reviews.author: don't have a witty username

customer_reviews.title: GOOD STUFF TO SPRAY FOR AUTOMOTIVE APPLICATION
customer_reviews.text: GOOD STUFF TO SPRAY FOR AUTOMOTIVE APPLICATION,SPRAY THIS FIRST LET IT DRY THEN SPRAY 3M UNDERCOATING,OR USE THIS ALONE IN PLACES LIKE THE ENGINE BAY FIREWALL INSIDE DOORS AND TRUNK
customer_reviews.author: John G.

customer_reviews.title: A must for boaters or the handy man
customer_reviews.text: This stuff really works to stop corrosion. Only drawback is that it comes out as a brown spray. It really coats whatever you spray and stays on.
customer_reviews.author: RCW

customer_reviews.title: Can't complain with CRC products
customer_reviews.text: I spray this all over my Mercruiser before winterization and before use in the summer. I would recommend degreasing the motor between uses. As with all CRC products it does what its supposed to do and works well.
customer_reviews.author: Travis

customer_reviews.title: Fluid film is better for a car/truck
customer_reviews.text: I expected fluid film type protection. It didn't penetrate or stay on like you'd want on a car encountering salty roads.
customer_reviews.author: ADAM D

customer_reviews.title: Used
customer_reviews.text: The can had been taken out of its bag and the straw was missing so it was a return and still changed full price . Product itself is good
customer_reviews.author: Dozzer

customer_reviews.title: Protects as described
customer_reviews.text: All as described. Recently applied. No long term results available at this point.
customer_reviews.author: GJC

customer_reviews.title: Works absolutely fantastic, no more wiring or connection problems or corrosion ...
customer_reviews.text: Salt water/salt air...a thing of the past. Works absolutely fantastic, no more wiring or connection problems or corrosion in my boat, Wish I had this product a long time ago. Saves all kinds of time and money!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mark D.

customer_reviews.title: the BEST corrosion inhibitor
customer_reviews.text: I spray down my boat trailer at least once a month with this stuff. It works flawlessly. On a boating forum they tested a bunch of different anti-corrosion sprays and the CRC won the vote. I believe they sprayed bolts and nuts, setting them in saltwater for 2 weeks and no corrosion whatsoever.
customer_reviews.author: Derek

customer_reviews.title: Coats really nice. Only time will tell how long this holds ...
customer_reviews.text: Works as far as application. Coats really nice. Only time will tell how long this holds up. I'll update latter on then.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny O

customer_reviews.title: Works.
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work but leaves a sticky residue. Not meant for areas you'll be touching or where aesthetics are important.
customer_reviews.author: JMK

customer_reviews.title: Goopy and thick, but no signs of rust yet
customer_reviews.text: I used this to coat the inside of my steel bike frame. It works well. It's hard to get it into all the internal parts, as there's no straw extension. Otherwise, perfect product. It'd be best for its intended use, obviously, but it works well if you can't find frame saver. I think it smells good too, but I happen to like the smell of chemical solvents. Might be something wrong with me.
customer_reviews.author: B.

customer_reviews.title: Thank you CRC!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works great. If I had a ocean going boat, I would spray the entire thing with it, to make it last. I use it a lot. Wear a mask spraying it, it's strong.
customer_reviews.author: Sasafracas

customer_reviews.title: Obvious on product
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. Only downside is the noticable residule it leaves.
customer_reviews.author: BEWARE

customer_reviews.title: Stops corrosion
customer_reviews.text: The product works quite well at preventing rust and corrosion, even in a salt water environment. Functionally it is a 5 Star product. It does impart a coating that I do not like to handle so I use it only in places that I expect to touch very little. It does work!
customer_reviews.author: Philby

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works just fine. Read this is one of the top two corrosion inhibitors. (Just cheaper than the other one)
customer_reviews.author: Kelisa

customer_reviews.title: Common Sense
customer_reviews.text: Wear gloves and particle filter mask, make sure to use this product in a well ventilated area. I use this product to prevent corrosion under the car. Use common sense when using this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Product as described but it did not come with the ...
customer_reviews.text: Product as described but it did not come with the spray straw so I have to give it three stars. I need the straw to spray in tight places on my boat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Needs Years to Determine
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work. Will know more in a year or two.
customer_reviews.author: David C. Edsall

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Like most CRC products, this performs exceptionally well in a marine environment.
customer_reviews.author: CameronC

customer_reviews.title: Poorly Packaged
customer_reviews.text: Product was poorly packaged and some were missing covers & spray nozzles.
customer_reviews.author: Jelani

customer_reviews.title: Nothing like it
customer_reviews.text: Unique in that it simply looks like a spray lube out of the can but after a few minutes sets up with a nice thin waxy-like film that lasts and lasts. Used on my boat engine compartment on everything metal and two seasons later you can still see the coating (not on metal that gets hot). No corrosion no rust no s---!
customer_reviews.author: Sweengolly

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product! I use it to prevent corrosion on ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product! I use it to prevent corrosion on my boat trailers and underneath my truck. My recommendation is to apply the product prior to any corrosion forming. I recoat yearly which may not even be necassary. This product is fantastic. Do not spray on anything you want to paint at a later time. The product is a yellow wax like substance that stays where you spray it.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Smells a little funny and is not clear
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work well to prevent corrosion. Smells a little funny and is not clear, but it works to prevent corrosion.
customer_reviews.author: Fanazon

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works great on cars. Sticks well and stays put when it dries. I sprayed it on the brake lines on my 2000 Honda Accord that have surface rust. A little squirt now will save a lot of pain and expense later! Sprayed this stuff on them in the fall and it stood up to the winter well. Note - The description says 16oz but what I got was 10oz cans. So the 5 star rating is for the product, NOT the description!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: CRC 06026 Heavy Duty Corrosion Inhibitor,
customer_reviews.text: Very good product, spray on thin film, dries quickly, stays on very well, stops corrosion. I will buy more when needed.
customer_reviews.author: HalibutZach

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product!!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing! It covers the metal and dries beautifully!!
customer_reviews.author: Joe V.

customer_reviews.title: CRC corrosion inhibitor
customer_reviews.text: Good for using on the boat, house and garden tools. Not only works as advertised (darn well) but smells good too. I keep one on the boat and one in the garden shed.
customer_reviews.author: Barry Bersch

customer_reviews.title: Worked okay
customer_reviews.text: Had a few coated screws still rust very quickly and it will turn the item yellow
customer_reviews.author: TP

customer_reviews.title: High quality product
customer_reviews.text: This will protect your truck, I use it in the doors and inside the tailgate, high quality product.
customer_reviews.author: KayakWesty

customer_reviews.title: The material is brown which doesn't look great against gel coated fiberglass -and- the material comes out ...
customer_reviews.text: Boating considerations: If you're buying this as an alternative to Corrosion Block  here are some things to keep in mind: The material is brown which doesn't look great against gel coated fiberglass -and- the material comes out more like a regular rattle can of spray paint instead of through a red straw (which cuts down on directional, precise applications)
customer_reviews.author: Huey_P_Long

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great stuff works as described great to protect metal n electrical from salt water
customer_reviews.author: Good&Plenty

customer_reviews.title: This is the greatest stuff to prevent corrosion and it works well as ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the greatest stuff to prevent corrosion and it works well as a lubricant too! I use it for everything I want to protect from moisture. It leaves a waxy film and lasts. Works good to keep automotive electrical connections from "greening" as well.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory H.

customer_reviews.title: Kind of like cosmoline.
customer_reviews.text: This does what it's supposed to. Adds protection as one adds coats. Kind of like cosmoline.
customer_reviews.author: J. GOAT

customer_reviews.title: Works Great on Seadoo Engines & Internal Components
customer_reviews.text: Using it on a pair of two-stroke engines in two Seadoos that see salt water use. There was already minor corrosion before I started using this but after one of them sank and the other partially flooded (both in salt water), it seemed like a good idea to try to keep the corrosion down. After rinsing with fresh water, sprayed the corrosion inhibitor on steel and aluminum components. Nearly a year later there is no additional corrosion.
customer_reviews.author: Pete

customer_reviews.title: I do like the idea of the product
customer_reviews.text: discolors the metal a bit. It may clear up after it dries thoroughly. I have not tested longevity yet. I do like the idea of the product.
customer_reviews.author: ralphie

customer_reviews.title: It has been working great on my towing hitch parts under the car
customer_reviews.text: Does what it supposed to do. Prevents rust from starting. The only thing you should not due with it is to spray areas where you will be in contact with your hands. It is a yellowish sticky coating you dont want to be touching. It has been working great on my towing hitch parts under the car. They are rust free.
customer_reviews.author: Tomasz F.

customer_reviews.title: Seems like the product itself is good but the nozzle likes ...
customer_reviews.text: Seems like the product itself is good but the nozzle likes to clog up no matter how much I shook it before hand. I had one can that was still half full due to this. I had better luck with Fluid Film.
customer_reviews.author: Richard P.

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended for use on tools
customer_reviews.text: It does the job it's supposed to do BUT it leaves a sticky mess. Not recommended for use on tools.
customer_reviews.author: neonglass

customer_reviews.title: I live 200 ft from the Ocean in central Florida ...
customer_reviews.text: I live 200 ft from the Ocean in central Florida So i have used this product for 6 years now. I put on a light coat, wait a day and put a second coat. Then once a year a light coat and I have exposed metal that has not corroded in the 6 years of use. Do not try a think coat as it puddles and runs. Two light coats and a year maintenance coat is all that is needed.
customer_reviews.author: Bob B

customer_reviews.title: CRC06026  Really great stuff !!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: CRC 0626 is a really good rust inhibitor, it's great to use on practically anything. I found very useful on preventing rust on the underside of the car. Just don't try to paint over the product.
customer_reviews.author: joe p

product_meta.title: CRC 06026 Heavy Duty Corrosion Inhibitor, 10 Wt Oz
product_meta.description: A long term, flexible corrosion inhibitor that protects and preserves metal surfaces, electrical connections, engine components and fasteners, subject to salt spray and high humidity. It also provides effective protection for steering and throttle linkages. Applications include electrical connections, engine components, equipment storage, fasteners, motors, salt spray protection, shaft, spindles, steering, and throttle linkages.
feature_bullets: Protects and preserves metal surfaces, electrical connections, engine components and fasteners, subject to salt spray and high humidity
Provides effective protection for steering and throttle linkages
Applications: electrical connections, engine components, equipment storage, fasteners, motors, salt spray protection, shaft, spindles, steering, and throttle linkages
Included Components: Crc 06026 Heavy Duty Marine Corrosion Inhibitor - 10 Oz.
